summary: Saheb, his wife, and a gangster who returns to take revenge.
cast: Jimmy Sheirgill|Mahie Gill|Irrfan Khan|Soha Ali Khan|Raj Babbar|Deep Raj Rana|Mugdha Godse|Rajiv Gupta|Dinesh Uniyal|Sanjay Brown|Hemendra Dandotiya|Pravessh Rana|Gaurav Samiley|Jeetendra Shastri|Charanpreet Singh
title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster Returns
